plot: This is a reminiscence of boyhood days. Two little urchins climb a tree heavily laden with ripe apples and shake a quantity of fruit to the ground. Then they descend and fill their pockets ...
title: The Farmer's Apple Tree
plot_es: This is a reminiscence of boyhood days. Two little urchins climb a tree heavily laden with ripe apples and shake a quantity of fruit to the ground. Then they descend and fill their pockets ...
